entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
